1. er zijn 127 dingen mogelijk. 1+2+4+8+16+32+64=128 er is dus 7 bits nodig voor alles. 

2: 
01101000 = 8+32+64=104 = h
01101111 = 1+2+4+8+32+64= 111 = o
01110000 = 16+32+64= 112 = p
01100101 = 1+4+32+64 = 101 = e 

antwoord: hope 

3: 

with great power comes great responsibility

w= 119 = 01110111
i= 105 = 01101001
t= 116 = 01110100
h= 104 = 01101000

g= 103 = 01100111
r= 114 = 01110010
e= 101 = 01100101
a= 97 = 01100001
t= 116 = 01110100

p= 112 = 01110000
o= 111 = 01101111
w= 119 = 01110111
e= 101 = 01100101
r= 114 = 01110010

c= 99 = 01100011
o= 111 = 01101111
m= 109 = 01101101
e= 101 = 01100101
s= 115 = 01110011
 
g= 103 = 01100111
r= 114 = 01110010
e= 101 = 01100101
a= 97 = 01100001
t= 116 = 01110100


r= 114 = 01110010
e= 101 = 01100101
s= 115 = 01110011
p= 112 = 01110000
o= 111 = 01101111
n= 110 = 01101110
s= 115 = 01110011
i= 105 = 01101001
b= 98 = 01100010
i= 105 = 01101001
l= 108 = 01101100
i= 105 = 01101001
t= 116 = 01110100
y= 121 = 01111001
